verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"You shall not take a <S%H802>wife<s%> for yourself <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3209>born<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> their <S%H517>mothers<s%> who <S%H3205>bear<s%> them, and their fathers who <S%H1>beget<s%> them in <S%H3205>this<s%> land: <S%H384><s%>

"They will <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H4463>deadly<s%> <S%H8463>diseases,<s%> they will not be <S%H5594>lamented<s%> or <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they will be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> and <S%H3615>come<s%> to an <S%H3615>end<s%> by <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Do not <S%H935>enter<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4798>mourning,<s%> or <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5594>lament<s%> or to <S%H5110>console<s%> them; for I have <S%H622>withdrawn<s%> My <S%H7965>peace<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "[My] <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H7356>compassion.<s%>

"Both <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>men<s%> and <S%H6996>small<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> they will not be <S%H6912>buried,<s%> they will not be <S%H5594>lamented,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will anyone <S%H1413>gash<s%> himself or <S%H7139>shave<s%> his <S%H7139>head<s%> for them.

<S%H3808>"Neither<s%> will men <S%H6536>break<s%> [bread] in <S%H60>mourning<s%> for them, to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> anyone for the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8248>give<s%> them a <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8575>consolation<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> for anyone's father or <S%H1>mother.<s%>
"Moreover you shall not <S%H935>go<s%> into a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> with them to <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7673>eliminate<s%> from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and in your <S%H3117>time,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>rejoicing<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>groom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride.<s%>

"Now it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> that they will <S%H559>say<s%> to you, 'For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5921>reason<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? And <S%H4100>what<s%> is our <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> or <S%H4100>what<s%> is our <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we have <S%H2398>committed<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?'

"Then you are to <S%H559>say<s%> to them, '[It is] <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> your forefathers have <S%H1>forsaken<s%> Me,' <S%H5800>declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord,<s%> 'and have <S%H3068>followed<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310>other<s%> <S%H312>gods<s%> and <S%H430>served<s%> them and <S%H5647>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to them; but Me they have <S%H7812>forsaken<s%> and have not <S%H5800>kept<s%> My <S%H8104>law.<s%>

'You too have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> [even] <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> your forefathers; for <S%H1>behold,<s%> you are <S%H2009>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H376>walking<s%> <S%H1980>according<s%> to the <S%H310>stubbornness<s%> of his own <S%H8307>evil<s%> <S%H7451>heart,<s%> <S%H3820>without<s%> <S%H1115>listening<s%> to Me.

'So I will <S%H2904>hurl<s%> you out of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> neither you <S%H3808>nor<s%> your fathers; and <S%H1>there<s%> you will <S%H8033>serve<s%> <S%H5647>other<s%> <S%H312>gods<s%> <S%H430>day<s%> and <S%H3119>night,<s%> for I shall <S%H3915>grant<s%> you <S%H5414>no<s%> <S%H3808>favor.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "when it will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H559>said,<s%> 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>'

but, 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> He had <S%H5080>banished<s%> them.' For I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> them to their own <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their fathers.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1728>fishermen,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "and they will <S%H1770>fish<s%> for them; and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6719>hunters,<s%> and they will <S%H6679>hunt<s%> them from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and from the <S%H5357>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks.<s%>

"For My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are on <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1870>ways;<s%> they are not <S%H5641>hidden<s%> from My <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> is their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H6845>concealed<s%> from My <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4932>doubly<s%> <S%H9608>repay<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and their <S%H9128>sin,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> they have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> My <S%H776>land;<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> My <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> <S%H8251>idols<s%> and with their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>"

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H4581>stronghold,<s%> And my <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress,<s%> To Thee the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> From the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "Our fathers have <S%H1>inherited<s%> <S%H5157>nothing<s%> but <S%H389>falsehood,<s%> <S%H8267>Futility<s%> and <S%H1892>things<s%> of <S%H3276>no<s%> <S%H369>profit.<s%>"
Can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> for himself? Yet they are not <S%H430>gods!<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to make them <S%H3045>know<s%> â€“ <S%H384>This<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> I will make them <S%H3045>know<s%> My <S%H3027>power<s%> and My <S%H1369>might;<s%> And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that My <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
